title: band of white scrolling up screen pixel 3xl
content:
I've got a problem on the screen - usually happens when I'm watching netflix, but can happen after I've turned netflix off - common factor here is that it starts up when I'm watching netflix (but not every time) and continues afterwards. usually a restart will sort it out

Basically, I will get a band of white/interference scroll up the screen. it's not a regular thing like every X seconds, it is seemingly random. 

Can't find anything similar on here. any ideas? screen works fine otherwise, all touch functionality etc. is fine.
